alert.note: Alert for Elmore; Montgomery (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued February 03 at 6:16PM CST until February 03 at 7:00PM CST by NWS Birmingham
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 930 PM CST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Urban and small stream flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...A portion of central Alabama, including the following counties, Elmore and Montgomery. * WHEN...Until 930 PM CST. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 616 PM CST, Doppler radar indicated heavy rain due to thunderstorms. This will cause urban and small stream flooding. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Montgomery, Millbrook, Wetumpka, Pike Road, Coosada, Eastdale Mall, Lagoon Park, Gunter Air Force Base, Auburn University In Montgomery, Montgomery Zoo, Boylston, Alabama State University, Alabama State Capitol, Pinedale, Montgomery Riverwalk Stadium, Mount Meigs, Blue Ridge, Bob Woodruff Lake, Emerald Mountain and Maxwell Air Force Base.
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Be especially cautious at night when it is harder to recognize the dangers of flooding.
